channel.title: Cannot find symbol "item". Help

item.title: Cannot find symbol "item". Help
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

I followed this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,384716.0.html

My problem is that I can’t find the variable “item”. I need it for item[1] and others.

Here’s my error when I compile: (I get 14 and it’s all the same)

client.java:19: cannot find symbol symbol: variable item location: class client item[i] = 0; ^
Other error are all same except for item[1] = 1291; and it’s all the same until item[11] = 4319;
Can you help me and make this variable item work please ?

Here’s my code:

[code]public void atkInterface() {
sendFrame126("@dre@Attack", 8716);
for(int i = 0;i<31;i++) {
item[i] = 0;
}
item[0] = 1291;
item[1] = 1293;
item[2] = 1295;
item[3] = 1297;
item[4] = 1299;
item[5] = 1301;
item[6] = 1303;
item[7] = 1305;
item[8] = 4718;
item[9] = 13643;
item[10] = 35;
item[11] = 4319;
for(int i = 8720;i<8799;i++) {
sendFrame126("",i);
}
sendFrame126(“1”,8720);
sendFrame126(“Bronze weaponary”,8760);
sendFrame126(“1”,8721);
sendFrame126(“Iron weaponary”, 8761);
sendFrame126(“5”,8722);
sendFrame126(“Steel weaponary”,8762);
sendFrame126(“10”,8723);
sendFrame126(“Black weaponary”, 8763);
sendFrame126(“20”,8724);
sendFrame126(“Mithril weaponary”, 8764);
sendFrame126(“30”,8725);
sendFrame126(“Adamant weaponary”,8765);
sendFrame126(“40”,8726);
sendFrame126(“Rune weaponary”, 8766);
sendFrame126(“60”,8727);
sendFrame126(“Dragon weaponary”, 8767);
sendFrame126(“70”, 8728);
sendFrame126(“Barrows weaponary”, 8768);
sendFrame126(“75”, 8729);
sendFrame126(“Pvp weaponary”, 8769);
sendFrame126(“75”, 8730);
sendFrame126(“God Sword weaponary”, 8770);
sendFrame126(“99”, 8731);
sendFrame126(“Attack Skillscape”, 8771);
sendFrame126("",8849);// members only skill
sendFrame126("",8827);//steel
sendFrame126("",8837);//mithril
sendFrame126("",8840);
sendFrame126("",8843);
sendFrame126("@red@Attack",8846); // first option
sendFrame126("@red@Strength",8823);
sendFrame126("@red@Defence",8824);
sendFrame126("",8859);
sendFrame126("",8862);
sendFrame126("",8865);
sendFrame126("",15303);
sendFrame126("",15306);
sendFrame126("",15309);

	sendSkillInterface(item);
	showInterface(8714);
}[/code]

Thanks.
